Individuals should consult local health authorities for the most current information.

items.title: Ignoring Trump threats, Europe hits Google with 2.95B euro fine for adtech monopoly

ai_summary: The European Union imposed a 2.95 billion euro fine on Google for antitrust violations.
Google was found to have abused its dominant position in the adtech market.
The fine relates to Google's practices in online advertising technology.
The European Commission investigated Google's adtech business for several years.
Google faces potential further regulatory actions related to its ad services.
